name: Shape Swap - Endless Running
description:
"Shape Swap - Endless Running" is a classic spiral adventure game with with lots of fun. Don't bottle flip, tap the shape. The game is very simple to play with intuitive touch mode controls and great user interface. Tap on the screen and change the shape of your character to pass through the obstacles. The faster you swap the shape of your character and pass the obstacles the more points you can score. Score the maximum points in this endless classic "Shape Swap - Endless Running" game and be on top of the leaderboard.

The endless runner game is designed with thrilling sound effects and challenging obstacles throughout the game. The game becomes more challenging and the speed increases as you cover more distance. Collect coins during the gameplay and use the coins to unlock the new and exciting different colored skins and trails for your character. "Shape Swap" is a perfect endless classic game for players of all age groups from kids to teens to adults. Play the endless runner game anytime and anywhere to enjoy the unlimited fun.

Download the challenging "Shape Swap" game and improve your focus skills along with response skills. Tap tap on the screen and keep swapping the shape of your character to get through the obstacles. Put on your gaming skills hat and challenge your friends to beat up your score. Survive in the game as far as you can and check out your gaming skills. Don't miss out the coins to unlock beautiful trails and colored skins for your character.
